sn13.6:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahapathavi parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya, thapetva satta kolatthimattiyo gulika.
sn13.6:1.4: katamam nu kho bahutaram, yam va mahapathaviya parikkhinam pariyadinnam ya va satta kolatthimattiyo gulika avasittha”ti?
sn13.6:2.1: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaram, mahapathaviya, yadidam parikkhinam pariyadinnam;
sn13.6:2.3: Neva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na satasahassimam kalam upenti mahapathaviya parikkhinam pariyadinnam upanidhaya satta kolatthimattiyo gulika avasittha”ti.
